name: hectically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is full of activity, or very busy and fast: We were hectically trying to get everything ready for the party before the first guests arrived. With the end of term only two weeks away, the students' days were hectically filled with writing essays and cramming for exams. Related word
hectic
More examplesFewer examplesA storm was approaching, so the grocery stores were hectically busy with shoppers trying to stock up on necessities. I was wearing headphones, and my co-worker was hectically waving his arms trying to get my attention.
